name: Bestin and the Beanstalk
description:
Best In Show (A.K.A. Bestin) is here for adventure! 

A lost princess needs his help to return to her home in the heavens! With the power of the magic drops, she can grow a beanstalk that will reach into the sky! (That's the plant for the theme btw.)

CONTROLS

Arrow Keys - Move
Down - Duck
S - Jump
A - Run/Shoot
